entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
